section.p: A report from the EMS crew to the emergency department summarizing the patient's condition and any remedial actions taken

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11388 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.2"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2022-01-01"
Extends
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] classCode="DOCCLIN" (CONF:10000)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] moodCode="EVN" (CONF:10001)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5363)
NEMSIS trace: eRecord.01 /@root should be the OID for the EMS Agency; @extension the internally assigned ID
The PCR UUID can also be used as an identifier in the /@root property, no extension required.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:5253)/@code="67796-3" EMS patient care report - version 3 Document NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10002)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title="EMS Patient Care Report" which SHALL equal "EMS Patient Care Report" (CONF:11389)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode="N" /@code="N" (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:11390)
Default value is "N" (normal)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] versionNumber (CONF:5264)
May be null, and in most cases will not be used. In circumstances where updates are likely, the first instance should be denoted by a versionId of "1."

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] recordTarget such that it (CONF:10004)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patientRole such that it (CONF:10870)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:10031)
NEMSIS Trace ePatient.05 . . . /PatientRole/addr/streetAddressLine (multiples supported) ePatient.06 . . . /PatientRole/addr/city ePatient.07 . . . /PatientRole/addr/county ePatient.08 . . . /PatientRole/addr/state ePatient.09 . . . /PatientRole/addr/postalCode ePatient.10 . . . /PatientRole/addr/country
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:10871)
NEMSIS Trace ePatient.01: root= the OID for the generating EMS agency, or "NI" ePatient.12: root=" 2.16.840.1.113883.3.184" (Social Security Administration) ePatient.20 and ePatient.21: root= the OID for the state department of motor vehicles, found at http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/identifier-registry.html, and reproduced in the appendix "Object Identifiers for US State Departments of Motor Vehicles".
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] telecom (CONF:11621)
NEMSIS Trace: ePatient.18
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patient such that it (CONF:10872)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] birthTime (CONF:10873)
NEMSIS Trace ePatient.17
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] ethnicGroupCode (CONF:10874), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Ethnicity Group 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.837 DYNAMIC (CONF:10032)
NEMSIS Trace: ePatient.14
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] name (CONF:10875)
NEMSIS Trace ePatient.02 . . . /PatientRole/Patient/name/family ePatient.03 . . . /PatientRole/Patient/name/given ePatient.04 . . . /PatientRole/Patient/name/given Name sub-elements SHOULD be in the following order: family, given, middle (also "given"). For names from cultures not following the order assumed above, the "family" name SHOULD be populated with whatever name component should be used to sort by. E.g., for a person with a single name, "family" should be used.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] raceCode (CONF:10876), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet RaceCategory 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.836 DYNAMIC (CONF:10033)
NEMSIS Trace: ePatient.14 NEMSIS collects race and ethnicity in the one-question format (see guidance at http://www.whitehouse.gov/omb/fedreg_1997standards), but the HL7 RIM and, therefore, the CDA schema contain separate elements. It is necessary to populate both CDA fields based on the values selected for the NEMSIS question. Further, the CDA model includes a single race code. In order to support multiple race codes as required by OMB, we adopt a second race code entry from the HL7 SDWG namespace. All documents with a race code must populate the CDA race code; if more than one race code is recorded, then the SDWG element may also be populated. No semantic priority is implied by the element selection.
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] sDTCRaceCode (CONF:10877), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet RaceCategory 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.836 DYNAMIC (CONF:10034)
NEMSIS Trace: ePatient.14
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] administrativeGenderCode (CONF:10035), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet STATIC (CONF:10878)
NEMSIS Trace: ePatient.13
See terminology map in the "Gender" Appendix.

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] AuthorParticipation such that it (CONF:10027)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] AuthorRole such that it (CONF:10879)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:10039)
NEMSIS Trace: eResponse.01 (required), eOther.08 (optional)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:10040)
Required for human author; may be null for a software device NEMSIS Trace dPersonnel.04. . . / AssignedAuthor/addr/streetAddressLine dPersonnel.05 . . . / AssignedAuthor/addr/city dPersonnel.06. . . / AssignedAuthor/addr/state dPersonnel.07. . . / AssignedAuthor/addr/postalCode dPersonnel.08. . . / AssignedAuthor/addr/country
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:10041)
Required for human author; may be null for a software device NEMSIS Trace: dPersonnel.09
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] HumanAuthor such that it (CONF:10880)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5470)
NEMSIS Trace dPersonnel.01 . . . Person/name/family dPersonnel.02 . . . Person/name/given dPersonnel.03 . . . Person/name/given
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] AuthoringDevice such that it (CONF:10881)
One authoring device is required for the document.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturerModelName (CONF:11630)
NEMSIS Trace: eRecord.02 Software Creator
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] softwareName (CONF:9999)
NEMSIS Trace: eRecord.03 and eRecord.04 (version), concatenated with an intervening caret ("^")

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] custodian such that it (CONF:5519)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] CustodianRole such that it (CONF:10884)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] representedCustodianOrganization such that it (CONF:10885)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:10886)
NEMSIS Trace dContact.05. . . / representedCustodianOrganization/addr/streetAddressLine dContact.06 . . . / representedCustodianOrganization/addr/city dContact.07. . . / representedCustodianOrganization/addr/county dContact.08. . . / representedCustodianOrganization/addr/state dContact.09. . . / representedCustodianOrganization/addr/postalCode dContact.10. . . / representedCustodianOrganization/addr/country
Optimal address may be where dContact.01 Agency Contact Type is "EMS Agency Director/Chief/Lead Administrator/CEO"
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:10887)
NEMSIS Trace: eResponse.01 @extension is the Agency identifier; @root, if included, the OID of the assigning body
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:10888)
NEMSIS Trace: eResponse.02

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participant such that it (CONF:10030)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="DST" (CONF:10054)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] time (CONF:11328)
NEMSIS Trace: eTimes.12 (Destination patient transfer of care date/time)
contain zero or one [0..1] associatedEntity such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:10055)
NEMSIS Trace: eDisposition.03-08 eDisposition.03. . . / AssignedAuthor/addr/streetAddressLine eDisposition.04 . . . / AssignedAuthor/addr/city eDisposition.05. . . / AssignedAuthor/addr/state eDisposition.07. . . / AssignedAuthor/addr/postalCode eDisposition.08. . . / AssignedAuthor/addr/country
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11601), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet DestinationType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.69 DYNAMIC (CONF:10056)
NEMSIS Trace: eDisposition.21
contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SDLOC"
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] id (CONF:11599)
NEMSIS Trace: eDisposition.02 - Destination/Transferred To, Code

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] documentationOf such that it (CONF:10028)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] serviceEvent such that it (CONF:10889)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ServiceType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.79 DYNAMIC (CONF:10051)
NEMSIS Trace: eResponse.05, type of service requested
SHALL contain at least two [2..*] id (CONF:10890)
NEMSIS Trace: eResponse.03 Incident Number id/@extension is the incident number assigned by the 911 Dispatch System, where the id/@root SHOULD be the OID of the dispatching organization NEMSIS Trace: eResponse.04 EMS Vehicle (Unit) Response Number id/@extension is the unit number assigned by the Agency, where the id/@root SHOULD be the OID of the Agency
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] performer such that it (CONF:10891)
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] functionCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProviderResponseRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.80 DYNAMIC (CONF:10052)
NEMSIS Trace: eCrew.03
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:10892)
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:10893), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet CrewRoleLevel 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.81 DYNAMIC (CONF:10053)
NEMSIS Trace: eCrew.02
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:10894)
NEMSIS Trace: eCrew.01
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] addr (CONF:10895)
NEMSIS Trace DPersonnel.04 . . . / assignedentity /addr/streetAddressLine DPersonnel.05. . . / assignedentity /addr/city DPersonnel.06 . . . / assignedentity /addr/state DPersonnel.07 . . . / assignedentity /addr/postalCode DPersonnel.08 . . . / assignedentity /addr/country
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] telecom (CONF:10896)
NEMSIS Trace: DPersonnel.09
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] assignedPerson such that it (CONF:10897)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:10898)
NEMSIS Trace DPersonnel.01 Last: @ENXP="FAM" DPersonnel.02 First: @ENXP="GIV" DPersonnel.03 Middle: @ENXP="GIV"

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] relatedDocument such that it (CONF:10029)
contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="RPLC"
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] parentDocument such that it (CONF:10899)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:10900)
NEMSIS Trace: eRecord.01

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] componentOf such that it (CONF:9955)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:10042)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] encompassingEncounter such that it (CONF:10882)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10043)
NEMSIS Trace: eTimes.03, the date the responding unit was notified by dispatch
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:11326)
NEMSIS Trace: eResponse.04 (response number)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] location such that it (CONF:10883)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] healthCareFacility such that it (CONF:10044)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:10045)
NEMSIS Trace: eResponse.13 (EMS vehicle/unit number), eResponse.14 (EMS unit call sign)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11381), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet UnitEquipmentCapability 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.82 DYNAMIC (CONF:10047)
NEMSIS Trace: eResponse.07
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] location such that it (CONF:10046)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PLC" (CONF:10050)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] name (CONF:10048)
NEMSIS Trace: eScene.13
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] addr (CONF:10049)
NEMSIS Trace eScene.15 . . . / assignedentity /addr/streetAddressLine eScene.16.. . . / assignedentity /addr/ eScene.17 . . . / assignedentity /addr/city eScene.18 . . . / assignedentity /addr/state eScene.19 . . . / assignedentity /addr/postalCode eScene.20 . . . / assignedentity /addr/intersection eScene.21 . . . / assignedentity /addr/county eScene.22 . . . / assignedentity /addr/country
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] encounterParticipant such that it (CONF:11325)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="CON" (CONF:11623)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:11624)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ASSIGNED" (CONF:11625)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] representedOrganization such that it (CONF:11626)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:11627)
NEMSIS Trace: eScene.02, other agency (ies) at scene

SHALL contain [1..1] CurrentMedication such that it (CONF:10008)
Conforms to EMS Current Medication Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.15:2022-01-01)

MAY contain [0..1] CardiacArrestEvent such that it (CONF:10009)
Conforms to EMS Cardiac Arrest Event Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.14:2022-01-01)

SHOULD contain [0..1] AdvanceDirectives such that it (CONF:10010)
Conforms to EMS Advance Directives Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.12:2022-01-01)

SHALL contain [1..1] AllergiesAndAdverseReactionsSection such that it (CONF:10011)
Conforms to EMS Allergies And Adverse Reactions Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.13:2022-01-01)

SHALL contain [1..1] PastMedicalHistorySection such that it (CONF:10012)
Conforms to EMS Past Medical History Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.19:2022-01-01)

SHALL contain [1..1] SocialHistorySection such that it (CONF:10013)
Conforms to EMS Social History Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.22:2022-01-01)

SHALL contain [1..1] PhysicalAssessmentSection such that it (CONF:10014)
Conforms to EMS Physical Assessment Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.20:2022-01-01)

MAY contain [0..1] MedicationsAdministeredSection such that it (CONF:10015)
Conforms to EMS Medications Administered Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.18:2022-01-01)

SHALL contain [1..1] ProceduresPerformedSection such that it (CONF:10016)
Conforms to EMS Procedures Performed Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.21:2022-01-01)

SHALL contain [1..1] PatientCareNarrativeSection such that it (CONF:10017)
Conforms to EMS Patient Care Narrative Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.1:2022-01-01)

SHALL contain [1..1] SceneSection such that it (CONF:10018)
Conforms to EMS Scene Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.8:2022-01-01)

SHALL contain [1..1] DispatchSection such that it (CONF:10019)
Conforms to EMS Dispatch Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.2:2022-01-01)

MAY contain [0..1] DispositionSection such that it (CONF:10020)
Conforms to EMS Disposition Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.4:2022-01-01)

SHALL contain [1..1] PersonnelAdverseEventSection such that it (CONF:10021)
Conforms to EMS Personnel Adverse Event Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.6:2022-01-01)

SHALL contain [1..1] ProtocolSection such that it (CONF:10022)
Conforms to EMS Protocol Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.7:2022-01-01)

SHALL contain [1..1] ResponseSection such that it (CONF:10023)
Conforms to EMS Response Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.3:2022-01-01)

SHALL contain [1..1] SituationSection such that it (CONF:10024)
Conforms to EMS Situation Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.9:2022-01-01)

MAY contain [0..1] TimesSection such that it (CONF:10025)
Conforms to EMS Times Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.10:2022-01-01)

SHALL contain [1..1] VitalSignsSection such that it (CONF:10026)
Conforms to EMS Vital Signs Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.23:2022-01-01)

SHALL contain [1..1] injuryIncidentDescriptionSection such that it (CONF:10869)
Conforms to EMS Injury Incident Description Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.17:2022-01-01)

SHOULD contain [0..*] eMSBillingSection such that it (CONF:11318)
Conforms to EMS Billing Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.5:2022-01-01)
Extends
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] classCode="DOCCLIN" (CONF:10000)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] moodCode="EVN" (CONF:10001)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5363)
NEMSIS trace: eRecord.01 /@root should be the OID for the EMS Agency; @extension the internally assigned ID
The PCR UUID can also be used as an identifier in the /@root property, no extension required.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:5253)/@code="67796-3" EMS patient care report - version 3 Document NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10002)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title="EMS Patient Care Report" which SHALL equal "EMS Patient Care Report" (CONF:11389)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode="N" /@code="N" (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:11390)
Default value is "N" (normal)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] versionNumber (CONF:5264)
May be null, and in most cases will not be used. In circumstances where updates are likely, the first instance should be denoted by a versionId of "1."

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] recordTarget such that it (CONF:10004)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patientRole such that it (CONF:10870)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:10031)
NEMSIS Trace ePatient.05 . . . /PatientRole/addr/streetAddressLine (multiples supported) ePatient.06 . . . /PatientRole/addr/city ePatient.07 . . . /PatientRole/addr/county ePatient.08 . . . /PatientRole/addr/state ePatient.09 . . . /PatientRole/addr/postalCode ePatient.10 . . . /PatientRole/addr/country
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:10871)
NEMSIS Trace ePatient.01: root= the OID for the generating EMS agency, or "NI" ePatient.12: root=" 2.16.840.1.113883.3.184" (Social Security Administration) ePatient.20 and ePatient.21: root= the OID for the state department of motor vehicles, found at http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/identifier-registry.html, and reproduced in the appendix "Object Identifiers for US State Departments of Motor Vehicles".

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] birthTime (CONF:10873)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] ethnicGroupCode (CONF:10874), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Ethnicity Group 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.837 DYNAMIC (CONF:10032)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] name (CONF:10875)
NEMSIS Trace ePatient.02 . . . /PatientRole/Patient/name/family ePatient.03 . . . /PatientRole/Patient/name/given ePatient.04 . . . /PatientRole/Patient/name/given Name sub-elements SHOULD be in the following order: family, given, middle (also "given"). For names from cultures not following the order assumed above, the "family" name SHOULD be populated with whatever name component should be used to sort by. E.g., for a person with a single name, "family" should be used.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] raceCode (CONF:10876), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet RaceCategory 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.836 DYNAMIC (CONF:10033)
NEMSIS Trace: ePatient.14 NEMSIS collects race and ethnicity in the one-question format (see guidance at http://www.whitehouse.gov/omb/fedreg_1997standards), but the HL7 RIM and, therefore, the CDA schema contain separate elements. It is necessary to populate both CDA fields based on the values selected for the NEMSIS question. Further, the CDA model includes a single race code. In order to support multiple race codes as required by OMB, we adopt a second race code entry from the HL7 SDWG namespace. All documents with a race code must populate the CDA race code; if more than one race code is recorded, then the SDWG element may also be populated. No semantic priority is implied by the element selection.
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] sDTCRaceCode (CONF:10877), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet RaceCategory 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.836 DYNAMIC (CONF:10034)

SHALL contain at least two [2..*] id (CONF:10890)
